price: Allah said, “O Iblīs, what is the matter with you that you were not with those who prostrated?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
